Protocols/VolumeDelegate.html#/s:9Volume.name: volumeBarWillShow(_:)
Protocols/VolumeDelegate.html#/s:9Volume.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a VolumeBar is about to be shown.

Protocols/VolumeDelegate.html#/s:9Volume.name: volumeBarDidHide(_:)
Protocols/VolumeDelegate.html#/s:9Volume.abstract: Notifies the delegate that a VolumeBar was hidden.

Protocols/VolumeDelegate.html.name: VolumeDelegate
Protocols/VolumeDelegate.html.abstract: Conforming types can receive notifications on when the VolumeBar shows and hides.

Classes/VolumeBar/AnimationStyle.html#/s.name: slide
Classes/VolumeBar/AnimationStyle.html#/s.abstract: Slide in and out of view from the top of the screen.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.name: sharedInstance
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.abstract: The shared instance of VolumeBar. This should be used in most cases.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC1.name: animationStyle
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/s:9VolumeBarAAC1.abstract: The animation style to be applied to this VolumeBar.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.name: animationDuration
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.abstract: The animation duration to be applied to this VolumeBar when being presented or hidden.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.name: minimumVisibleDuration
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.abstract: The minimum duration to be shown on screen.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.name: segmentCount
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.abstract: The number of segments that the VolumeBar should be broken into.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.name: interitemSpacing
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.abstract: The spacing between segments of the bar.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.name: statusBarHidden
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the status bar on the current view controller is hidden.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.name: statusBarStyle
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@M@VolumeBar@o.abstract: The status bar style of the current view controller.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@CM@VolumeBar@.name: show()
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@CM@VolumeBar@.abstract: Shows the VolumeBar at the top of the screen.

Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@CM@VolumeBar@.name: applicationWillResignActive(notification:)
Classes/VolumeBar.html#/c:@CM@VolumeBar@.abstract: Observe when the application background state changes.

Classes/VolumeBar.html.name: VolumeBar
Classes/VolumeBar.html.abstract: VolumeBar, volume indicator that doesn’t obstruct content.
